text: Bottle from Rewe - clear dark golden color, small white head. high carbonation, sugar, yeasty, malty body, spicy. good.

Brown ale with a nice tan head.

Aroma: some maltiness, caramel and some dark fruits.

Taste: malty, caramel, dark fruits and some yeast.

Robe brune aux reflets rubis avec une fine mousse blanche pour des arômes de bonbon, de figue, de raisin sec et d'épices.
En bouche on retrouve des saveurs sucrées et caramélisées avec des notes de malt, de raisin sec et d'épices.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Almost clear deep brown. 
Decent head and lacing. 
Full body with caramel, candy, bourbon.
Sweet, heavy palate.
Nice after dinner drink.
Gifted from our friend Barn
Krachtige bruine trappist uit Nederland. Zoetig fruitige smaak met caramel.
Piwo wypite jakiś czas temu. Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji, w ramach uzupełnienia profilu.
Niestety, zbyt dużo cukru, jak dla mnie. Na razie najsłabsze La Trappe, jakie piłem. Karmel, rodzynki, suszone jabłka i żadnej kwaskowatej kontry. Muli i przytłacza.
Greetings from Bydgoszcz, Poland to all Beer Geeks and Hopheads around the world!

#1370Bottle. Almost clear brown to red body, small white head. Aroma of caramel, honey, fruits. Taste is moderately sweet, lightly bitter. Caramel, raisins, dates, yeasts. Medium body and carbonation. OK.

Bottle. 
Mainly malty in taste, sweet notes. Full body average carbonation.
Bottle 0.33l. Cloudy, red to brown colored. AROMA- pear, cherry, caramel, alcohol. FLAVOR- neutral, caramel, dates, raisins, alcohol. Fuller bodied. Not bad.
Draft - Fruity dark plum and raisin. Dark brown with a small beige head. Dark candy sugars and some raisin. Nice.

Mycket vackert rubinröd med beiget skum. I doften finns massor av fikon och dadlar plus lite banan. Smaken är lite kryddig med stor fruktighet av fikon och dadlar, lite banan och nötter. En mycket god dubbel med stor komplexitet både i doft och smak.

Partagée avec mon cher Appiantiqua dans nos petits verres Duvel: belle robe orangée cuivrée surmontée dune mousse ivoire avec une bonne carbonatation.Le nez nous offre des aromes levurés , maltés et vineux . La bouche nous amène sur des saveurs à limage du nez avec une petite pointe "piquante" très rafraîchissante et agréable mais au fur et à mesure de la dégustation,cette sensation sestompe....Une bonne double mais avec aucune note exceptionnelle!.

Dégustée avec mon petit Kittenbieer dans un verre Duvel 18cl.
Température de début environ 6 °.
Belle robe orange cuivré sombre surmontée dune mousse ivoire de persistance moyenne; carbonatation intense.
Nez levuré et malté avec de discrets arômes de pâtisserie.
Goût caractéristique des doubles mais sans excès de sucre et avec une petite note piquante appréciable; en se réchauffant les saveurs levurées reprennent le pouvoir ce qui nous plait un peu moins...
Larrière bouche assez longue nous laisse une impression correcte(pas de lourdeur) mais napporte rien dexceptionnel.
Une bonne double mais nous ne sommes guère amateurs de ce style!

From old tasting notes. Cloudy, ruby red color. Thick creamy beige head. Sweet toffeeish malt nose. Soft fruity pasted malt flavor is complex and savory. Nice candy like malt finish . Long chewy aftertaste.
Dunkle Kastanienfarbe, trüb mit normaler Schaumkrone. Malzig süsser Sirup-Antrunk, ölig vollmundig, der Alkohol kommt mir zu stark durch. Wärmendes niederländisches Bier für die kalten Tage.

Enligt en fram till nu okänd sägen ska det vara direkt plågsamt att bli törstig hemma hos trappistmunkar. Anledningen kan vara den oändliga tid det tar att bryta sig igenom den massiva skumkrona som ligger som ett plåttak över ett i övrigt bedårande vackert öl. Smaken och aromen är inte mycket sämre. Rakt igenom fruktig, väl balanerad bäska och sötma som efterlämnar en bränd känsla i munnen avrundad med torkad frukt och alkohol.

UPDATED: MAY 3, 2017 0,3 l Flasche. Aroma: Frisch, fruchtig, leicht bananig, wie Schwimmbad. Aroma: Rotbraunes, trübes Bier, cremefarbener Schaum, schöne Gardine. Geschmack: leicht fruchtig, fast wie ein Weizen mit höherem Alkoholgehalt. Nachgeschmack: unangenehm bitter. Gesamt: Mit Trappisterbieren werde ich (noch) nicht warm.
Hodně dobré pivíčko, podobně jako vechny La Trappy. Skvělí říz a jemná bohatá pěnečka.

Opaque date brown with a thin beige head. Medium to full body, medium carbonation, some lacing. Nice fruity aroma of dried fruits, plums, dates, cherries, figs, raisins, banana, yeast, molasses, caramel, toffee and cloves. Spicy and sweet taste with dark fruit, dark malts and toffee aroma upfront. Interesting taste of slightly oxidized apples in between. Slightly bitter aftertaste. Very smooth and enjoyable Dubbel.

Flaska från SB. Mörk, kastanjebrun med fingerhögt beigegult skum. Sockersöt doft av konjaksdränkta russin, råsocker, katrinplommon och maltsötma. Mellanstor. Maltigt, sött, med lite humlebett som väger upp en aning. Stiltypisk stor, söt belgare.

Bottle. Color: Ruby, frothy nutbrown head. Taste: Red fruit, alternating medium sweet and bitter notes, lightly caramel and coriander hints. Finally a dubbel where the sugars are not prominent. Nice one!
Ótima cerveja! Aroma adocicado clássico do estilo, frutado e resinoso. Formação ótima de espuma.

0,33 l bottle. Pours hazy brown with a finger of tan frothy head. Aroma of malt, caramel, raisin, bread and yeast and plenty of gentle fruity notes. A hint of alcohol too. Flavor is similar, starts very yeasty and quite sweet, followed by fruity notes and caramel. Taste is light sweet and light bitter, some very light sourness is present too. Body is very light for ABV, texture is slick and carbonation average to lively. Finish is quite long, mildly bitter fruity aftertaste. Very nicely rounded dubbel, very fruity and drinkable.

Dark reddish-brown hazy colour, small bubbles tan head. Sweet aroma, full of caramel, raisins and malt notes. Sweet taste, kind of licorice sensation, hints of banana bread and caramel. Long end, slightly bitter aftertaste, barely astringent, high carbonation, medium body. Good enough to try it more than once.

330ml bottle at deTolly. Dark reddish-brown, small off-white head. Malts, prunes, caramel, cherry, rubus in aroma. Malts, raisins, caramel, prunes, chokeberry. some liquorice, alcohol, yeast in taste. Medium to full bodied, below average carbo. Rich malty brew, interesting.

Butelka 330 ml. Wysoka piana, barwa brunatna. Średnie wysycenie do wysokiego. Aromaty belgijskie, ziołowe; w smaku: drożdże, lekki karmel, suszonka; goryczka niewielka- bardziej słodowe, ale takie pełne. Jakoś nie trafia do mnie ten styl, ubogi krewny tripli i kwadrupli.

@home, 330ml, trappist glass (wide opening). Perfect dark brown appearance of molten caramel, complex flavours with traces of caramel, nuts and chocolate, however rather sour and with a disappointing finish. Head drops quickly, low co2. Drinkable, but there are better trappists.

Flasche 0,33l: Mahagoni, Rubin, leichte Trübung, kräftiger stabiler feinporiger Schaum; kräftige Süße in der Nase, Malz, Malzzucker, Karamell, süße Würze, eingelegte/getrocknete Früchte, leichte Röstaromen, leichte Nussigkeit, dezente Hopfennoten, süßliche Bitterkeit; sehr süßer würziger Körper, Malz, Malzzucker, Karamell, eingelegte/gegorene Früchte, cremig, kräftige Kohlensäure, Röstaromen, nussig, süßliche Bitterkeit, Hopfen, zunehmend trockener, Kaffee, dunkle Schokolade; angenehmer würziger Nachgang mit Röstaromen
malty aroma with hints of plum. dark red in color with nice long lasting pale brown head. taste is malty, notes of raisin and plum
Bottle 0,33. Pours clear amber with quickly diminishing off-white head. Molasses, yeast, red berries, malts, toffee. Full body and average carbonation.
Mahogany color, small beige head. Sweet aromas with sugar, caramel, marmelade, dried fruits and spices. Sweet taste with dried fruits, yeast, spices, sugar and slight alcohol. Easy to drink.
Dark amber colour, good amount of lacing. Toffee caramel malt taste, watery texture. Sweet taste.

Tried this one a long time ago, maybe my first Trappist beer but never got to reviewing it. Found it again at a discounted price and so, here it goes. Somewhat faint aromas of caramel and toasted malt are upfront. Taste is full bodied, intense, like a quadruple but more restrained. This is quite a dubbel.
Deep hazelnut colour. Moderately-sized, bubbly head. Aroma is earthy with a fruity character. Taste is sweet caramel, plums, and nuts. Perfect carbonation.

Butelka 330 ml, cena 8,5 zł
Aromat: Estry kwiatowe i owocowe, przede wszystkim wiśnie, moim zdaniem też lekkie cytrusy a nawet jabłko. Wyczuwalny karmel i delikatnie alkohol.
Wygląd. Barwa wiśniowa, klarowne. Piana drobna, kremowa, wysoka na 2 palce, następnie dość spora powłoka. Niewielki lacing.
Smak: Duża owocowość, karmel. Posmak skórki od chleba i gumy balonowej. Dość wyraźny, lecz nie przeszkadzający alkohol z wyczuwalną goryczką. Delikatnie kwaskowe. Dobrze nagazowane, spore skojarzenie z winem musującym. Odpowiednia cielistość.
Bardzo solidne piwo, dość oryginalne w smaku, przez co nadaje się do powtórki pomimo dość wysokiej, jak na polskie warunki ceny.
Bella dubbel color mogano con abbondante schiuma color nocciola. Olfatto soprattutto frutta matura e note dolci caramellate. Corpo poco più che esile. Scarsa carbonazione. Gusto soprattutto dolce

330ml bottle from Systembolaget. Dark deep hazelnut color, medium size tanned head, some lacing. Malty and earthy aroma with sweet dried fruit, dates, nuts, toffee, cloves and hints of booze. Medium bodied with lively carbonation, smooth and chewy mouthfeel. Sweet taste caramel, chocolate, nuts, dates, plums, bread and peppery yeast. Pleasantly warming finish, low bitterness.
Kastanjebrunt med høyt beige skum. Moden banan, brød, vanilje og tørket frukt i duften. Smaken følger bra. Et herlig øl til ostefatet.

Birra dal marrone. Schiuma spessa e discretamente persistente. Allolfatto note fruttate e con toni di malto. Al palato si avverte una modesta vena amara e un gusto fruttato e piacevolmente leggero. Birra da pasto ma anche da conversazione. Una birra piacevole.

From
A brew hawk mystery case. Pours very dark brown with a thin head , although needed 3 small glasses to put given the original very thick head. Very sweet , tastes like bubblegum. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

UPDATED: FEB 19, 2017 La birra si presenta scura con riflessi rubino ed un bel cappello di schiuma color nocciola abbastanza persistente. Al naso spiccano note di malto caramello, zucchero di canna, frutta matura. In bocca è dolce con note di malto e caramello.  L?amaro è appena percettibile solo nel finale. Corpo medio e carbonazione medio-alta.

świetne piwo o kolorze ciemnego, lekko metnego rubinu z beżowa/drobna pianą, która zbyt szybko znika. aromat lekko owocowy, czuć przyjemny i delikatny karmel. smak słodkawy z posmakiem czekolady gorzkiej.

Nagyon szép mélybarna színű sör. Aránylag tartós bézs színű habbal. Eléggé szénsavas. Illatra gyümölcsös-gyógyfüves, és éreztem kicsit az alkoholt is. Mintha valamilyen likőrt szagolnék. Ízében elsőre a malátát éreztem, de a gyógyfüves-gyümölcsös (aszalt szilva?) íz is végig jelen volt. Érdekes, hogy a kicsit édeskés íz a végére keserű utóízzé vált. Nagyon ízlett.

1/2 pint at de Hems. Pours deep chocolate brown, persistent tan head. Big burnt toffee, molasses, fig aroma. Huge mouthfeel with lively chewy texture. Caramel, figs, port, prunes on the taste with lovely balance. Fantastic.

From 33cl bottle. Pours dark brown with medium cream foam. Aroma is caramel, dry fruits, a little hazelnut, a good alcoholic feeling. Body is medium-dense with some stickiness. Taste is relatively sweet, with just a bit of bitterness in the end. Finish is still sweet, not particularly interesting.
Aroma of sweet caramel and spices. Taste of the same. Pours a dark brown with a tan head. Very good.
Pite przed założeniem konta na ratebeer. Ładnie się prezentowało. Dubbel jak dubbel.
Bottle. Smooth and well balanced. Some pleasant esters, a bit high residual sweetness however. Presence of some dry fruit and lovely caramel. High drinkability.

330ml bottle @Bir&Fud Bottega (Rome). Bruna-rossastra, leggermente torbida, schiuma media. Al naso sentori di malto, caramello, zucchero di canna, anice, uva passa, esteri. In bocca è dolce, maltata, con finale appena amaro. Corpo medio, carbonazione media. Buona.
Een heerlijke dubbel. Fles gedeeld met LiekevdV. Het is een heerlijke dubbel, met een licht fruitige afdronk.

bottiglia 33 cl, schiuma media grana beige persistente, colore rubino, al naso malto banana spezie, in bocca malto banana uva passa e caramello, carbonatazione moderata, leggero amaro e buon corpo, lalcool è ben bilanciato, dolce, media persistenza e leggero amaro nel finale. Buona Dubbel

UPDATED: JAN 31, 2017 Bottle at home. Expiry date January 2019. Purchased from Auchan. Pours a dark, crystal like amber with medium foam, which quickly dissipates. Smells of grapes, cherries, barrel. Tastes like fresh, young wine, cherry barrel, sweet, wet bread. Big bubbles, medium carbonation. Sweet, dry caramel residuu. Excellent.

Très belle couleur rubis transparente avec une belle mousse ivoire épaisse. Nez sur le caramel, le sucre candi, la cassonade, le pruneau, le raisin sec, les fruits rouges et noirs (fraise, mûre, framboise...), les fruits jaunes (abricot, ananas, pêche), les agrumes (orange, citron, mandarine, pomelo), le kiwi, la banane, la mangue, lherbe coupée, le cuir, le bois... Beaucoup darômes, belle complexité et bon équilibre avec lalcool. En bouche, belle texture, petite sécheresse au palet, alcool nerveux et liquoreux avec ses 7%, carbonatation vive rappelant les vins pétillants et petite amertume de circonstance. Les sucres nensuquent pas le palet, arômes de pomme verte, de prune et de poire tandis que lalcool rappelle vraiment les liqueurs associées. La levure est droite, très nette, et apporte ses petites saveurs de bois et de champignon sur larrière-bouche et dans la longueur. Le final est sur le cuir, les végétaux, la liqueur, un côté vieil alcool mûri en fût de chêne très agréable. Il me manquera une véritable texture, une accroche au palet pour être entièrement conquis. Mais cest vraiment une excellente bière, de loin celle que je préfère de la part de La Trappe. Bouteille 33cl, V&B Grenoble.

Ar: Molasses and dark, sweet bread; ripe peach and cherry, with some toffee; slight sherry note. Ap: Brown-amber with a medium tan head, low retention, leaving a thin ring of foam and a galaxy-like spot of foam in the center. T: Toffee and sweet bread, molasses; plum and cherry esters mid-palate, with warming alcohol; medium-low bitterness, a bit grassy and herbal. P: Medium body with high carbonation, finish is very dry. O: Good example of a Belgian dubbel; not the most complex or rich example, but very drinkable and has some cool nuances.
Backlog. Przenoszenie ocen z innego serwisu, z czasów przed założeniem konta na ratebeer

Bottle. Ruby Red in colour. Fruity; raisins, cherries, dark fruits. Spicy. Yeasty. Malty; sweet malts, caramel, toffee, hint of chocolate. Spicy-sweet, fruity, aromatic, malty, full-bodied ale with slight hoppy undertone. Rich sweet fruity finish. Nice Dubbel! (2011-08-09)

One of the best dubbels a man can have. The first impression: sweet, caramelized, fizzy and oily with the balanced bitterness. 
Aroma:caramel, chocolate. Liquid: amber, hazy, frothy, tan foam. Taste: medium sweetness, medium bitterness. Medium bodied, oily feel, fizzy, bitter finish.

Pours mahagony brown with medium beige head. Aroma is creamy, caramel, brown sugar, raisin, cinnamon, wooden. Taste is caramel, butterscotch, raisin, wooden, some grass, light resin, butter, dried dark fruits. Very nice beer!

Reddish dark brown color with medium thick beige head. Aroma of caramel malts, yeast, cherries and other dark fruits, as well as alcohol. Taste is sweet and has notes of caramel, vanilla, cloves and again dark fruits. Alcohol is discretely present. Medium body, average carbonation. Creamy and smooth, an excellent dubbel.

Bottle, historic rating, source not noted. Poured dark brown with a small tan colour head. Aroma is fruity, sweet caramel and rather malty. Quite sweet and a bit medicinal, touch of sour. Medium bodied, bit high carbonation.
Pours thick white head, dark reddish colour. Smoky, strong taste but not bitter.
Delicious dutch with fruit and some chocolate coffee taste. Drink nice and easy.
Una cerveza espectacular. Un aroma y sabor acaramelado. Combina muy bien el sabor dulce con el amargo. Hasta ahora una de las mejores cervezas de abadía que he probado.
user_location: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, SPAIN

text: Pours light brown with tan head. Aroma is earthy, wet grass, some dark fruits. Flavour is quite bad for a dubbel (the worst ever tasted), earthy, mild fruits, metallic presence. Low body and carbonation. Really disappointed.

APARIENCIA: de color marrón, con destellos rojizos a contraluz, se observa muy ligeramente turbia y una mediana-alta actividad de carbonatación. Corona de espuma color marfil de buena retención, con burbujas compactas.

AROMA: notas a azúcar no procesada, caramelo, frutos rojos, frutos oscuros como ciruela y pasas, ligeramente dátiles, muy ligeramente la levadura se percibe y algo herbal de los lúpulos utilizados.

SABOR: predomina el azúcar no procesada/candy sugar y el caramelo, frutos rojos, frutos oscuros marcados como ciruela, pasas, el carácter de la levadura se percibe más, algunas notas a pimienta, algo herbal de los lúpulos utilizados. En el retrogusto queda un amargor ligero alto, levemente dulce.

SENSACIÓN: cuerpo ligero alto, mediana carbonatación.

RESUMEN: buena cerveza para el estilo que representa.
Są zioła, są rodzynki, jest karmel. Dobrze ułożone piwo, alkohol raczej niewyczuwalny.

UPDATED: DEC 30, 2016 Bottle. Hazy reddish-brown colour with a medium tan head, nose is yeasty and fruity with lots of banana and dark caramel, taste is roasty and sweet, reminds of cane sugar, a moderately dry finish and again banana in the aftertaste with some medicinal notes, maybe a little light-bodied.
Backlog, ocena przepisana z untappd, w ramach uzupełniania profilu na ratebeer.
bomber pours dark amber with thick white head aroma of dried fruit and caramel, taste the same with boozy finish
Head quickly dissapeared. Aroma of raisins, caramel, red fruits, biscuits. Taste is malty. fruity, refreshing, medium sweet. Bitter is low, carbonation is medium-high. Tasty beer.
Bottle. Dark brown color with belge head. Aroma has caramel, malt, yeast and dark fruits. Taste is malty sweet with long quite sweet aftertaste. Flavors of dark fruits, malt, bread and vanilla.

Backlog. Synchronizing with notes and Untappd.
A bit tannic, spicy, with some dried fruit and quite malty - very interesting beer.

Dark reddish Brown. Big head. Subtle aroma. Brown sugar, yeast and malt. Taste: Malt, sugar, caramell, yeast, red berries. Nice carbonation. Aftertaste is a little bit sour. Its alright but there are way better Dubbel out there.

De color marrón rojizo muy oscuro, con una apetecible corona de espuma color beis, muy cremosa y de duración media.

Su aroma es dulzón (no en vano se emplea maltas tipo Caramel). Huele a caramelo tostado y fruta madura.

En boca es cremosa y muy amable. Dulce, pero no pesada. Incluso su final es bastante largo y con algunas notas amargas. Mucho más refrescante de lo que su aroma predice.
Nice fine carbonisation. Rye, chocolate, banana, orange zest. No cloying sweetness here. Could have more body.

Enjoyed: Poured from a bottle into a trappist glass.
Appearance: Deep red/brown colour, with rich creamy head. 
Aroma: Fruits, caramel
Palate: Full body, moderate carbonation with many small nibbling bubbles.
Taste: Light sweetness, caramel, banana, moderate bitter aftertaste with bread taste.
Overall impression: Very enjoyable and tasty. Reminds me of wooden barrels, I dont know why.

UPDATED: NOV 17, 2016 Denne dubbel har et uklart brunt udseende med et medium hvidt skum. ?llen har en s?d og ristet karamel aroma og smager deraf med s?dme fra frugter. Kraftfuld is?r med s?dmen. Bitter afrunding. Medium karbonering.

Bottle from Alkoshop. Aroma: Really nice aroma, caramel in dried fruit, figues and also spices, really pleasant. Appearance: Low head quickly disappearing, brown body. Taste: Seems quite light, caramelly, dried fruit, very spicy, lightly tanninic. Palate: Sweet finish, medium-low body, medium carb.
From a 33 cl bottle. Pours a clear mahogany with a tan head. Aroma of caramel. Flavors of toffee and butterscotch. Smooth, malty finish.

UPDATED: DEC 16, 2016 Amber  body creamy white head.

Smell of caramel, followed by a faint acidic touch.

Good balance on the palate, with a slight sweet prohiminence
Good

medium aroma: sweetly from the beginning, with honey and brown sugars syrup, caramel, continues with yellow fruits, flowers and moist hay, some alcoholic warm (light cognac, rum, some liqueur) and belgian yeasts.
medium taste, typically belgian: pleasant peach jam with flowers and some roses, honey, a sweet juice of fermented fruits, caramel, some cereals and belgian yeasts.

a very good beer!
A caramel taste that is not overly sweet, just a very smooth and rich texture, soft and easy to drink. Very, very pleasant roasted flavour.

Superbe robe brune aux reflets ambrés, mousse crémeuse et dense à la fois. Nez puissant et complexe sur des notes chocolatées, café au lait, fourrure, épices, pointe de caramel, très complexe. Bouche à lattaque élégant, finement maltée, bulle fraîche et finale tendue, qui manque légèrement dampleur pour être parfaite. Néanmoins une très belle brune dabbaye typée.

Bottle : 330 ml. Price: 1,69 eur 
Tamsus, didelė kreminė puta, labai geras skonis

A deep red coloured, translucent beer with smallish beige head. Aroma is raisins and caramel, a little bready. Taste is quite sweet with sweet malts and notes of raisins and caramel. Maybe just a little metallic, but very enjoyable nonetheless. Slightly bitter aftertaste, quite weak. Carbonation is on the high side. Overall very nice dubbel.
Découverte dans la Saveur box. Bière brune maltée au nez. En bouche on retrouve le malt les épices. Bière douce malgré les apparences. Bonne bière.

Bottle - Pours with a nice head, initial aroma of sweet malts, but the first taste is funky bready bubblegum, and it didn't finish on the palette any better. After giving it every possible chance, after a few more mouthfuls, I poured it down the sink! YUCK!

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

33cl bottle at home. Pours a red amber colour with a decent off white head. Aroma of yeast, malts, caramel, figs, prunes, raisins. Taste is fairly sweet, soft bitter with a sweet finish. Notes of caramel, candy sugar, raisins, malts, banana, slight resin. Texture is oily, medium bodied woth soft carbonation.

Bottle at home. Pours red amber with medium sized off-white head. Aroma has Belgian yeast, malts, booze and some sweetness. Taste is full of yeast, malts and sweetness with hints of banana. Nice and "soft" mouth warming mouthfeel. Long finish. Nice dubbed trappist!
Una experiencia muy buena. La Trappe Dubbel es una cerveza trapense clásica de tono oscuro y sabor intenso a cebada y caramelo, con sutiles matices dulces de dátiles, miel y frutas deshidratadas.

De la cerveceria La Trappe Trappist - Abadía O.L.V. Koningshoeven(NETH) esta Dubbel de nombre La Trappe Dubbel con 7% ABV, icónico estilo de abadía de color rojizo profundo a color cobre o incluso llegando a un tono ligeramente marrón, versión mas fuerte de la cerveza de diario para los monjes, como todos los productos fabricados en la abadía de Koningshoeven cuenta con el logo de Autentico Producto Trapista(ITA), vamos a probarla.
En aspecto tiene una pronunciada corona de espuma aunque la retención no es tan buena, perlas compactas con algo de fibrosisdad, el color es un profundo color rojizo con destellos mas claros de la misma intensidad, cuerpo mediano en las paredes del vaso.
El aroma es bueno y complejo, de inicio están las maltas dando un ligero toque a chocolate dulce y a pan, la levadura nos da un perfil a clavo típico de la variante de esta bacteria utilizado en estilos belgas, licor marcado, tambien hay aroma a azúcar candy, frutosidad como a pasas, es lo que mas destaca.
En paladar es dulce con un final amargo a lúpulo que la hace seca, hay sabores distintivos a azúcar candy, corteza de pan, la malta obscura apenas y se presiente aportando un ligero y efímero gusto achocolatado, caracteres frutales como a uva, muy especiada y ligeramente terrosa, parecería por el aroma que seria una cerveza mas compleja, el sabor a alcohol se queda de poco en poco resaltando cada vez mas dicha característica pero de ahí en fuera fácil de tomar.

Kolor bordowy, burgundowy, klarowny. Piana nie jest ani wysoka ani imponuj?co trwa?a.
Aromat palonych s?odów, ciemnych owoców z odrobin? karmelu.
W smaku wiod?c? nut? s? ciemne, sma?one owoce i dalej karmel z lekk? palono?ci?.
Wysycenie ?rednie, pasuje. Faktura jest do?? g?sta a nawet oleista.

Malty sweet (biscuits, little dark bread notes) with caramel candy notes, plenty of fruits like figs, prunes, dactyls, raisins. Low bitterness. Sweet caramel/candy finish to aftertaste. Semi-full body, highly carbonated. Nice and broadly available dubbel.
Medium dark, malty and slightly sweet. Typically malt overpowers hop but a nice once in a while beer.

Color marrón oscuro (con reflejos rojizos), muy turbio, con capa de espuma marrón claro de un dedo de grosor (no mucha retención). Carbonatación presente (sobre todo en boca). Aroma frutal, a malta, algo de alcohol, algo dulce (quizá azúcar). Sabor increíble, a malta, dulce, frutal también, con regusto final muy ligeramente alcohólico (en el buen sentido). El sabor se mantiene en boca un buen rato y la carbonatación es un plus. Única y maravillosa. Una Dubbel para la historia.

Miedziane piwo o obfitej pianie, która zdobi szkło i pozostaje do końca w formie warstewki na powierzchni. Aromat typowe dla dubla ciemne belgijskie owoce, głownie rodzynki. W smaku bardzo ułożone, ciemne belgijskie owoce i trochę ziół. Goryczka średnia. Bardzo dobry dubel, świetnie ułożony, smaczny i pijalny.
On tap in Amsterdam, very sweet dubbel. Nice fruity aromas and flavor. Complex and smooth.

Una Dubbel Trapense de color marrón turbio con abundante espuma. Su aroma es dulce a caramelo con leche, tostado. Su sabor es a toffee, caramelo con leche, frutos secos y con un amargor suave con final de alcohol.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Fles (75 cl tht 2007) gedeeld met familie. Donkerbruin helder bier met weinig schuim. Aroma is caramelachtig. Smaak van caramel en chocolade. Beetje zoet. Nasmaak is iets bitter. Lekker bier, valt wel zwaar.
Aromas of blackcurrant, spice yeast and that cheese mold you get on Brie. Deep red brown colour with nice head. Flavor disappointing slightly but is spicy with a powdery dryness in the finish.

Dark ruby red with an off white creamy head. Caramel spice a bit of dried fruit aroma. Taste follows with a hint of roasted malt and dark chocolate.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Bouteille 33 cl - couleur rubis sombre, trés bonne odeur de poire et de banane, au goût on est sur la banane, la poire, amertume en fin de bouche qui reste
Bottle from Alko. Pours dark red with foamy tan head. Aroma has banana, caramel, dark fruits and brown sugar. Taste has banana, dark fruits and brown sugar. Very smooth and great beer.

Sweet sugary cookie dough aroma. High carbonation, nice strength a bit of alcohol in the finish but mostly brown sugar, bread, and some light medicinal spiciness. Nice spice and doughy malts dubbel. Im not a fan of hardcore freaky dubbels but this one is enjoyable in that its not over the top but has character. Nice.

Pulloa avatessa olut ryöppysi ulos pullosta, mutta trappistilasiin kaadon jälkeen vaahto häviää hyvin nopeasti jättäen vain pienen reunuksen. Tummanruskea, hieman punertava olut. Tuoksu miellyttävä, kypsän hedelmäinen ja karamellinen. Maku ei yllä tuoksun tasolle. Banaaninen ja tumman hedelmäinen sekä hieman hiivainen. Loppumaultaan hieman kuivan katkera. Keskitäyteläinen suutuntuma. Kyllä trappistilta vaan odottaa aina enemmän. Tämä menee lajiin "ihan kiva", muttei yhtään enempää.

Flaska bröderna bistro, örebro saluhall. 
Brun kulör. Beiget finbubbligt skum. Doft av äpplekart, jäst och bränt socker. Aningen söt smak med frukt och mörk sirap. Lätt torr avslutning.
Brown with tan head. Toasted fruit aroma. Medium or less carbonation, less than I expected. Dark fruit and toasted or burnt taste. Some sweetness.

Mörkt mahognybrun med beige-färgad fast krona. Doftar sött, lite malt. Smakar ganska tunt, lite stickigt. Eftersmaken ganska lång, bränt farinsocker. Beställdes på klosterbesök med munkarnas köttstuvning.

UPDATED: JUL 24, 2016 Det 44750ml bottle. Shared with C were @kolo. Pours red/brown. Big creamy head. Sweet aroma, malt, glucose. Taste is fine, sweet, brown sugar. Medium body, good texture. Fine beer
Bottle. Pours hazy mahogany brown with frothy tanned head. Aroma is Belgian yeast, a bit metallic, malts and fruits. Flavour is smooth, raisins, plums.

Bottle - Hazy brown colour, medium steady beige head. Intense caramel aroma with some raisins, dats and dred plum. Taste is sweet with brown sugar, dried plum and caramel. Medium body, medium carbonation, smooth texture, sweet finish. Nice classic dubbel.

Bottle. Pours a dark brownish red with a fading light beige bubbly lacy head. Aroma is of forest fruits, molasses, nuts, bread, copper. Taste is of more forest fruits, nutty, molasses, slightly metallic finish. Sticky oily mouthfeel, medium to hard carbonation.

UPDATED: DEC 10, 2016 Pours clear ruby with huge dark tan head. Strong aroma of caramel, spice, zest, toffee, dark sugar, raisins, cooked dark bread and sherry cask matured scotch (oak, dried fruit, etc.). Tastes rather sweet but with some sourness to balance. High carbonation, medium body, assertive alcoholic warmth. Nice velvetty smooth aroma, but too sweet.
rotbraun leuchtend mit gelblich-beigem Schaum. süßlich malzig, Aromen von angebranntem Zucker, Nüssen und roten Früchten. leicht bitter

Aroma: prunes, dried berries, light roasted notes.
Taste: sweet with fruity sourness.
Flavour: roasted, prunes, warming spices.
Light bitterness in the aftertaste.

Good and balanced.
Bonne bière. Mousseuse en bouche, peu damertume, sucre léger. Bien fait, rond et assez long en bouche. Bonne double traditionnelle.
330ml Bottle (Pitchers, Västerås) - Dark brown in colour. Marzipan, caramel and raisins in the aroma. Rich and moderately sweet taste with raisins, cocoa, caramel and marzipan.

UPDATED: DEC 28, 2016 Barwa ciemna. Brunatna, gęsta, drobna piana. Aromat bogaty, trochę słodki, troche owocowy. Mocny i wyraźny. Smak bardo przyjemny. Nuty karmelowe mieszają się ze świerzymi owocami. Alkohol nie wyczówalny. Mój ulubiony dubel.

75

Dark brown with a small head of foam that lasts.

Caramel malt, dark fruit, bit of cardboard smell.

Tastes of pitted fruit, yeast, caramel malt and cardboard. Love the dark fruitiness of raisins and plums. Not a fan of cardboard/oxidation.

That being said, I reckon this Dubbel is a good one.

0.3 bottle. Pours dark brown color with small, lasting off-white head. Aroma of caramel, malt, yeast, fruits. Flavor is medium sweet, medium bitter. Caramel, fruits. Finish is medium long and bitter. Medium to full body, oily texture,average carbonation.
Van t vat. Roodbruin bier met wit schuim. Geur: moutzoetig, karamel. Smaak: zoet en iets bitterig. Medium volmondig. Afdronk zoetig.

Color: Tono caoba con una capa de espuma color marfil.

Aroma: Aroma afrutado con tonos cálidos de vainilla, caramelo y chocolate tostado.

Sabor: La Trappe Dubbel es una cerveza trapense clásica de tono oscuro y sabor intenso a cebada y caramelo, con sutiles matices dulces de dátiles, miel y frutas deshidratadas.

Regusto: Dulce y ligeramente amargo.

Bottle @ Friends/chef. Appearance: pours clear copper with good tan soapy head and lacing. aroma/taste: caramel, brown sugar, light chocolate, some dried fruit, orange peel and spices. palette: strong yeasty aroma, average carbonation, medium body, medium tonotable sweetness, somewhat balanced by a mild to medium bitterness, average duration and an oily texture. overall: tasteful sweet and malty dubbel.

0.33 l bottle to a La Trappe glass. Deep brown color, white head. Bread, malts, fruits, sweet alcohol scents and even some hops in aroma. Bread, malts and sweet alcohol in taste. Sweetish palate. Medium to heavy body, soft carbonation.

Poured into a La Trappe Chalice. I had to have this dubbel a few times before rating and I have to say I was really pleasantly surprised by the overall taste and feel of this dubbel. Not much of an aroma in the glass. The appearance was reddish to rusty brown with visible sediment and plenty of carbonation adding about an inch of head that steadily remained and laced throughout. This was a very smooth beer to me, very similar to the Ommegang Abbey Ale but with far less bitterness in the finish. Some mild yeast and malt in the taste as well as the plum/dark fruit flavor present in the back. The tastes were mild but it works. I have to drink this a few more times for sure but I am pretty surprised to say this is one of my favorite dubbels.

Belle double couleur brune claire. Mousse aux teintes de café. Peu damertume, de la rondeur. Du sucre mais très maitrisé. Des notes de grains torréfiés grillés, prune confite.
Une très bonne brune tout en douceur.

330ml bottle and 500ml bottle or crock. Filtered, then bottled with yeast and sugar. First brewed in 1987. Ingredients: Water, Barley malt, Hops, Yeast. "Discover this genuine dark Trappist beer with a gentle flavour, creamy head and pronounced bouquet.La Trappe Dubbel has a deep brown colour and attractive beige froth. The use of caramel malt gives it a gentle aromatic caramelised quality. It has a rich malty flavour with a touch of sweetness. Post-fermenting La Trappe Dubbel is a smooth drink, and yet has some real body and intense flavour to it.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bottle. Pours red to brown colour with a frothy, beige head. Aroma of malt, yeast, caramel and toffee. Taste of roasted malt, yeast, caramel, toffee and dried fruits. Rich flavor with a full body and medium carbonation. Enjoyed it.
Gyümölcsös, karamelles illat. Karamelles, pörkölt íz. A pörkölt ízből egy leheletnyivel több van benne a kelleténél.

Extraordinaire ! Le goût de La Trappe Dubbel est très particulier, il y a un coté bonbon à la banane, sucré et fruité que jadore. Très peu damertume, voire pas du tout, très onctueuse en bouche. Manque un poil de longueur en bouche, ce qui est normal vu sa faible amertume. Très proche de la Trappe quadruple, juste un peu moins sucrée.Une de mes bières préférées, et de loin.

A 330ml bottle with a best before date of July 2016, poured into a Chimay goblet glass. It poured a deep dark brown / amber colour with a one finger beige head that dissipated fairly quickly but left nice lacing. Aromas of raisins, dried cherry, toasted malts, caramel, toffee and bubblegum. Tastes of sweet dark stone fruits of plum, prunes, raisin and cherry, grape juice, banana and a light toffee finish. Creamy, medium bodied with moderate carbonation. Overall a very nice Dubbel that is tasty and easy to drink.

Aroma: roasted dark malts, belgian phenols, peachy.
Appearance: deep brown color and beige head.
Taste: low herbal bitterness, zesty, belgian phenols, roasted dark malts, caramel, quite dry.
Palate: medium body and medium carbonation, roasted finish.
Overall: Nice dubbel, really balanced and drinkable.

bottle: pours an orange caramel colour with a tan head ....aroma of dried fruit especially prunes, malty and yeasty.......tastes of dried fruit especially raisins, caramel, maybe hazelnut, and toast.......medium sweet with a slight bitter finish....some warmth from the alcohol...would be excellent with a winter stew

Leżakowane, butelka do 04.2016. Gushing lekki, kolor brązowy, piana ecru, kremowa trwała. Aromta suszonych owoców, scherry, musujące i owocowe. Słodkie zaraz po nabraniu do ust następnie nuty opiekane, suszone owoce i długi wytrawny finisz.
Rödbrun ale med vitt skum. Lätt arom av torkad frukt, dadel, hasselnötter. Fyllig sötma och rund smak av mörk kandisirap, russin och fikon. Härlig trappist.

Bottle at the Royal Standard, Cambridge. Reddish-brown, thin. Very little visible carbonation. Fruit caramel on the aroma. The malt scent is too naked for my liking, giving the scent an almost artificial note. Exceedingly sweet taste with yeast, chocolate and hazelnut notes. Slips down like a dream, the carbonation is well-judged and the alcohol is warming. Not a top top Dubbel in my book but very good.

Bottle, 75cl. Pours deep, dark ruby-red with huge, foamy beige head. Lots of lacing that remains stable like forever. Lovely. Intense and rich nose. Caramel malt, yeast, red fruits of ripe berries along some spices. Makes you think of candy sugar. Medium-heavy sweet fruity, caramel and yeasty flavour. Dark fruits and eastery sensation. Brown sugar and brandy. Roasted, almost burnt taste. Weak, almost no bitterness. Plesant warming alcohol in dry, long finish with dark fruits being dominant. Full bodied, medium carbonation and oily texture. Wow.

Bottle. Fruity aroma, mostly pear. Later sweet and spicy notes appear. Deep copper / brown, clear, medium and short lasting head. Medium sweet taste, caramel, fruits, no bitterness. Medium body and carbonation, Decent, but not really a beer to remember

Karamel, Vanille, Fruchtaromen drängen sich in die Nase. Toll. Und dann erst im Mund. Alles was wir aufgrund des Geruches schon wussten kommt klar und ausdefiniert zur Geltung. Der Nachhall angenehm alkoholisch und trocken. Weltklasse!!!! Free Probierschlückchen vom Hahn(2x0,1l) im CRAFT BEER SHOP HH. Bier 2/7!!!!!
330ml bottle from Bliznetsy in Moscow. Pours brown with a large beige head. Aroma is dark fruits, caramel, wine notes. Taste is caramel, brown sugar, notes of brandy.
W nosie drożdże, gruszki, śliwka jerozolimka, jabłka. W smaku lekki karmel, suszony banan, nieco cierpkości. Dobre wysycenie, bardzo przyjemne w ustach. Solidne piwo, belgijski klasyk.
Bottle (750ml about $12): Brown with tan head. Toasted fruit aroma. Medium or less carbonation, less than I expected. Dark fruit and toasted or burnt taste. Some sweetness.
Caramel, coriander aroma, not strong. Medium off-white head, hazy dark brown color. Strong taste, sweet, spicy, with some dark fruit flavor. Medium to high body.
Aus der Flasche. Rot-Braun. Geschmack schwer fruchtig, Karamell, Birne, etwas bitter. Angenehmes Bier
Bottle 33cl, Carrefour in Madrid. Very good appeareance, dark rubi colour. A lot of body, dense. Caramel smell. Sweet, fruit flavour. Alcohol palate. A great beer.
Bottle. Pours brown. Aroma and taste is mostly pear. Its ok, but its way to much pear and its not very complex.

Very good, though a bit thin. Pours a nice deep mahogany with lasting top of beige foam. Aroma is malty with caramel and candi sweetness. Flavor follows very similarly, but feels like something is missing there, mostly due to the thin mouthfeel.

Pours dark from the bottle. The creamy head has a yellowish tinge. Lots of yeast and banana in the aroma. First taste is pleasingly complex, with the burnt caramel malt overtone nicely leavened by a nicely balanced sweetened sasparilla, and hints of dark fruit but also, faintly, strawberry. Finish is warming and a bit alcoholic. Good but not among the best of the Dubbels.

33cl Belle bière brun rouge à mousse retombante. Nez : prune, raisin, caramel. Bouche : caramel, orange, épices ... pas du tout écoeurante. Arrière-bouche légèrement amère. Encore une superbe bière de la brasserie trappiste HOLLANDAISE (pour une fois ! :-)

Tomada do tap, em um cálice La Trappe. Coloração de madeira escura, levemente avermelhada, com espuma sólida e duradoura, de boa formação. Aroma doce, com notas de tabaco, frutas secas, passas, ameixa. Na boca, doce, sabor de chicletes e as mesmas frutas do aroma, final quase sem amargor, mas a presença do alcool é sentida pelo calor. Corpo médio, baixa carbonatação, sem comprometer o bom equilíbrio.
God sødme, og næsten ingen smag af humle og en lille snert af gærrester (tror jeg det må være). En god dubbel med den "klassiske" belgiske smag (selvom den er hollandsk).

Bouteille. Nez légèrement malté, de caramel toffee sucré, léger de mélasse et de fruits (prunes et raisins) et très léger dalcool et de levures. Rondeur moyenne. Goût fruité (raisins, prunes) et épicé (clou de girofle) lors de lentrée en bouche suivi dun goût légèrement sucré (gomme balloune) et de caramel malté (avec des touches de noix) puis dun goût de caramel toffee / sucre brun assez sucré avec une légère amertume dalcool Arrière-goût légèrement aigre de fruit (prunes, raisins) et très légèrement amer et chaud dalcool. [notes 2005]

Roodbruine kleur met matig schuim. Aroma van caramel, fruit (voornamelijk banaan), Belgische gist en gebrande mout. Smaak is zoet en fruitig. Ook duidelijk roasty caramel. Hints van banaan. Iets plakkerig en een kleine bitter op het einde. Nagenoeg geen koolzuur.  ---Rated via Beer Buddy for Android

UPDATED: MAR 17, 2016 Dubbel suave. Con mucho aroma. Tiene un punto de salir a regaliz. Cuerpo medio. Esta bastante bien si no fuera porque lleva jarabe de glucosa, es decir azúcar, y eso me parece trampear la cerveza.

Pours very dark brown/red with fine tan colored head. Decent retention, not much lacing. Complex malty, caramelish flavor supplemented with underlying fruitiness. Sweet, with the "bubble gum" definitely appearing in the flavor. Ends with a slightly spicy, alcoholic note (its pleasant and warming though). I kinda lack any more words to describe it, honestly, its rather hard for me to reviews beers like this one. Regarding general reaction: its alright, no amazement though, fairly tasty.
Fra flaske på Mi2, Cardinal feb-16: brunrød ravfarge med beige skum. Deilig og meget velbalansert aroma og smak - røde bær, gule epler og lys sjokolade. Eminent drikkbar.
Shared bottle at Cardinal, Stavanger. Pours light brown with off-white head. Aroma of raisins, dark dried fruits, chocolate, vanilla. Tastes sweet with some bitterness. Medium bodied, dry mouth feel.

0,33l bottle. Hazy dark brown colour with slowly shrinking beutiful beige head. Aroma: Banana, yeast and hiding roasty aromas with dark fruits. Taste: Sweet malty taste with again banana and yeast. Almost no bitterness just a little one in the end. Mild/medium carbonation with medium body. Sweet finish that slowly turn into light bitterness. Very good dubbel.
Degustata in bottiglia da 33 centilitri. sentori di uva passa, nocciole. Dolce-amaro ben calibrato. Molto liquorosa, ottima.

En botella de 330 ml. Color rojizo amarronado con abundante espuma beige. Aroma no demasiado fuerte a vino, caramel y frutas secas. Sabor frutal y refrescante. Buena dubbel.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Hazy mahogany. Medium beige head, medium retention. Aroma intensity 3/5. Notes of malt, cloves, bread, vanilla and thyme in the nose. Medium bitter, a bit of sour bread aftertaste. Medium to full body

33cl bottle on 14-Feb-2016, poured into a pewter tankard. Red brown colour with a medium sized beige coloured head. Aroma of fruit, molasses and caramel. Medium to full body and medium carbonation. Sweet flavour and slightly sticky aftertaste. Fruity, with lots of banana and some dark berry fruits.
Color miel, espuma abundante. Aroma dulce. Sabor a caramelo, fruta, ligero especiado. Cuerpo medio, cremosa.

Pours a deep ruby red with a beige, creamy head. The aroma is banana, bubblegum, straw and belgian yeast. The taste is a sweet cinnamon with a hint of over ripe bananas and a spicy finish. I love a dubbel and this does not disappoint.
Dark ruby with medium head. Aroma of wine, caramel, malt and dried fruit. Taste is medium sweet with low bitterness, a bit watery, alcohol aftertaste is also present.

Bottle from Cork & Cask. Hazy chestnut body with a thin beige head. Lively carbonation. Faint lacing. Aroma of raisins, brown sugar, cherry, red apple and toffee. Flavour of candy, stewed apple, earth and flat Coca-Cola. Medium body with a sticky mouthfeel. Very fizzy. Sweet yet refreshing.

0.3 l bottle, bottled in September 2015. Clear, deep red with a medium large, foamy, almost stable, tan head. Sweetish-malty, slightly fruity aroma of caramel, raisins, prunes, apple syrup, almond and some alcohol. Sweet, malty and slightly fruity taste of caramel, apple syrup, almond, raisins, prunes and some chocolate, followed by a short, slightly bitter, minimally roasty, yeasty and slightly warming finish. Medium to full body, smooth and creamy mouthfeel, average carbonation. Rather sweet but with enough hop bitterness and a roasty touch. Nice!

Pours an beautiful amber color with medium beige head. Appearance is hazy. Smells of fruits, biscuits and caramel. Medium to high carbonation, love it how it dances on your tongue. Taste is fruity and complex with a pretty strong presence of alcohol. Alcohol here works in a good way because it actually brings out the not so obvious spices and flavours more into the light.

Overall, excellent strong ale.

Brown, hazy, ruby highlights. Modest head that vanishes soon. Dark fruit, brandy, sugar syrup on taste. Medium body. Oily. The flavour is relatively dry. Dark fruit, vinous, alcohol well hidden. Smooth bitterness. Good-- rated with beerbasher/winphone
I almost shed a tear at the beauty of the pour. Medium off white head with a deep brown body. Aroma is plums. Flavor sweet fruit and sugars with light carbonation and thin body. Outstanding.
Bottle from Appellation Wines. Rich dark amber colour, aromas of banana, toffee apple and vanilla. Taste is more sweet than bitter, but finely balanced nonetheless.

Bottle 33cl. Red brown with a loose, medium off white head that fades quickly. Sweetness in the aroma combined with hints of wood and malts. The taste is surprisingly flat, little sweet, some touches of wood again. Not too special.

La Trappe Dubbel raczej niczym szczególnym. Ma brązową barwę, średniej wielkości, lekko beżową pianę. W aromacie trochę śliwki, rodzynek i przypraw. W smaku lekko metaliczne. Mamy ciemne owoce, przyprawy i sporą słodycz. Alkohol lekko wyczuwalny. W sumie dobre, ale bez rewelacji!
Bought in a grocery store and drank at home. A really nice beer wich is seriously undervalued in the Netherlands(in my opinion).
Bottle from Drinkshop. Clear amber-brown colour. Rather sweet. Fruity, caramelly, light burnt sugar, dried fruits, light light chocolate. High carbonation, rather easy drinking.

Bottle; BB 07/2017. Pours brown with a ruby hue; the head is light beige, persistent and somewhat lacing. On the nose its so satisfyingly sweet of the best kind of caramel candies, plus, all Estonians will know: barbariss! - the tiny red berries that give off a sweet and bitter aroma and flavour. Theres also some fruity esters later on, but overall its pretty straightforward. Tastes as sweet as Id expect - thats the glucose syrup in there - with a bit of red berry bitterness following. Pretty crisp on the palate, with a bit of a dry finish, and a lightish medium oily body. I quite like it.
A nice abbey dubbel, but it is just not my favorite style out of the traditional abbey styles. The taste just isnt for me.

30cl bottle, served in Trappist chalice. Poured a chestnut brown with a small one finger ivory colored head. Aromas of sweet caramel, roasted malt, banana, cloves. Tastes of especially caramel, vanilla, toasted bread, dried fruit, banana, cotton candy. A medium body with a pretty short lasting but smooth & sweet finish. Overall a pretty good sweet tasting dubbel.
Red to brown color, medium beige head. Aroma dried fruits, yeast. Taste full mouth, caramel, fruits, spices, long finish. Dried fruits and light bitterness in aftertaste. Excellent dubbel.

Bottle, 33cl, opened at home on NYE.

Opaque. Red//black and with white lacing. Aroma is spices, marzepan, Christmas cake, burnt toffee, burnt chocolate cake. Taste is Christmas cake, spices, oranges, marzipan, sweet malts, licorish, bready yeast. A wonderful and complex beer. Excellent.
Bottle..Dark body . Sweet dried fruit aroma. Taste of bubblegum and banana and dried fruit. Fantastic dubbel

Belle apparence, la couleur est brun acajou (nuances de rouge). La mousse contraste magnifiquement avec sa couleur beige claire. Magnifique aspect. 
Le nez est caramélisé avec des rappels de clous de girofle et dorange.
En bouche, elle est assez ronde, avec un gout de caramel discret et sans gout de malt discernable mais un léger gout de houblon assez agréable.
Touche finaje jégèrememnt amère. Surcée et caramélisée. Léger gout dorange. 

Bière très agréable.

Murky reddish brown with a two finger tan head, even with a gentle pour. Aroma of plums, raisins and iron. Taste is also a bit metallica. Also sweet honey, alcohol, and dark fruits. Not bad but has some distracting off flavors. Lively carbonation and medium bodied

A gift from a good friend. From 330ml bottle, a moderate foam and firm aroma. Hint of sweetness with a good character. Warm brown colour. Fresh feeling that invites to drink a second bottle. Maybe 500ml would be better size. Light after taste with more caramel.-- rated with beerbasher/winphone
Duft maltet svag karamel smag maltsød karamel lidt svesker lidt rødebær i eftersmag

Piwo rubinowe, jednolicie zmętnione. Piana obfita, drobnopęcherzykowa, trwała. Ładnie koronkuje. Aromat leśnych owoców i jabłek, lekko drożdżowy, świeży. W smaku lekkie, karmelowe, odrobina toffee, czuć trochę alkohol i owocową kwaśność. Nieźle. Wysycenie średnie do wysokiego, goryczka średnia, nie zalega.

330ml bottle from Appellation Wines. Pours clear dark red brown with a thick beige head. Aromas of banana and brown bread, red fruits. Taste is sweet, caramel, banana, toffee. Cleans up nicely on the finish.

Flaske i Brugsen. Farven er rødlig brun med en beige skumkrone (flot). Aromaen er abrikos, karamel, krydderier og chokolade. Smagen er nødder og karamel med en bitter afslutning. Jeg har kun givet den 2 ved palate, fordi jeg synes den mangler mundfylde.

Bottle, 33cl. Pours reddish brown with a nice beige head. A very rich apricot aroma, fruity and complex. General fruity flavours, some character reminiscent of grapefruit but overall not really identifiable, dry finish. With the yeast a new hit of spiciness and almost piquant flavour comes in. Oily and full body.

Excelente trapense oscura. Buen aroma, gran sabor, de las mejores trapenses que probé. Muy recomendada. Debería tener mejor rating de lo que tiene.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Aroma is yeasty and fruity. Theres sweet nuts in here and toffee. Taste is way too sweet for my liking, but theres something in the underlying taste that is intriguing. No bitterness.

Goede dubbel uit de buurt die ook nog vrijwel biologisch geproduceerd wordt. Geen wilde smaken en constante kwaliteit.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Ja prima dubbel, bruin zoet bier. Mooie volle smaak en behoorlijk zoet. Verder weinig spannend. Zoals verwacht. Backlog from 2015/02/26.

330ml bottle. Fairly clear dark brown colour with a large tan head. Aroma of fruity and slightly spicy malts, caramel. Flavour matches the aroma, fruity caramel malt, some sweetness, a little yeast, spiciness.

Delft 24-11-2015 (Mitra)

Dubbel bier. Wat meteen opvalt is enorm hoge koolzuurgehalte. Prikkelt bij de eerste slokken echt enorm lang na op de tong. Maakt hem bijzonder maar na een tijdje verdwijnt dit en dan blijft er weinig bijzonders over. Heeft wat weg van rode wijn/rood fruit. Licht bittere nasmaak die lang blijft hangen.
Pours brown with a tan head. Aroma of fruit, grass, caramel and malts. Taste is sweet malts and fruit.
Dark red color, thick creamy foam, caramel, spicy, coffee, chocolate aroma, sweet and spicy start, caramel and light bitter finish. well balanced palate, really good beer

Aromat: przyjemny, dojrzałe słodkie banany, tosty, karmel, delikatnie przyprawowe.
Wygląd: barwa ciemno bursztynowa, piana na początku potężna, później opada.
Smak: słodkie banany połączone z karmelem i tostami, w tle delikatne przyprawy, goryczka niska, brak alkoholu.
Tekstura: średnio pełne, wyscenie umiarkowane.
Ogólne wrażenie: smaczne piwo, fajny aromat, mimo słodowego charakteru piwo nie jest ani zalepiające ani mdłe, dość pijalne. Na plus należy zaliczyć doskonale ukryty alkohol.
Bottle - dark red with decent frothy tan head. Sweet, slightly fruity - banana. Ting on tongue / in mouth. Alcoholic but not overally tasting - smooth, nice beer.
From Hipercor. In La Trappe glass. Playing Goodbye Deponia. Nice caramel taste with a slightly dry end.

Aroma: Sweet dark berries and fruit. 
Flavour: Very sweet with dark berries and caramel with a yeasty finish. 
Colour: reddish brown with an offwhite head.
33cl @ bottle. Dubbel scura, aroma un po debole, forse troppo alcol in evidenza ma comunque ottima birra trappista.
Superb Dubbel. Dark red delight, lovely creamy mouthfeel, smooth sweet finish. World class.  ---Rated via Beer Buddy for Android
Een zwaar dubbel bier, zeer traag te drinken. Weinig schuimkraag, een zeer donkere kleur.

the aroma is caramel and fruity with hints of raisin, toffee, bisquit and plum... the taste is caramel and spicy with notes of dried fruits, raisin, toffee, red wine and fig... sweet, dry and, a little bit, warming aftertaste...

F: average beige, quick gone.
C: dark red to brown, hazy.
A: sweet fruity, banana, caramel malt, yeast.
T: caramel malt, cherries, banana, raisin, dark fruit, yeast, hint of spice, some little dry bitterness on the palate, medium body, average carbonation, well balanced dubble.

Piwo ciemno miedziane z bardzo slaba piana. Aromat winny, owocowy, sliwki, wisnie podbite slodem, chlebem i karmelem. W smaku polwytrawne owocowe jak w aromacie i slodycz od slodow. Piwo pilem w temp. 16c i.wyszedl alkohol w smaku. Na poczatek w ramach zapznania ze stylem ok.

Tap. House of Trembling Madness, York. Looks great in the proper glass, poured well. Fruity, and nutty. Pretty vinous. Taste is soft sweet, with a vinous tang. Smooth palate. Super drinkable. Dry, nutty finish.
Very nice beige head which combines perfectly with its dark amber body. Has a sweet flavour to it. Honey and banana aroma. Usually easy to find, which is imporant!

bottle 0,33.
Brown color. Winy, spicy aroma. Complex taste: warming, alcohol, caramel. Good.

Dark brown color with a huge beige head. Strong aroma of yeast, malts and some dark fruits. Rich and sweet malty taste with caramel. Smooth to drink, Finishes quite fruity. Overall very enjoyable dubbel

reddish brown color with a quickly dissipating head; spicy, dark fruit aroma; really smooth, great dark fruit flavor; notes of cherries, plums, and raisins; also caramel notes and wood; dry, dark fruit finish
Well abalanced beer with strong aroma of caramel and malt. Taste is spicy, but mostly caramelish. Cool dubbel

The aroma is strong and malty. Red dark color. Generous head. Maybe surprisingly strong carbonation for a belgian beer but the equilibrated taste is nice. Caramel, honey malty taste. Full body but not too heavy, Sweet on the palate with long finish. Ready to drink one more!

UPDATED: OCT 7, 2015 Marrom escuro, espuma bege de média formação e persistência (copo inadequado). Aroma bastante frutado, uva passa, cereja, amora, framboesa, adocicada, muito atraente. Paladar segue o aroma, evidenciando mais o malte, dulçor médio. Corpo denso, baixa carbonatação. Aftertatse duradouro, cremoso, adocicado, muito boa !

Clear brown, light brown head
Sweet malts, toffee, winey, raisins, burned caramel, brandy
Sweet caramel, licorice, wild chestnut honey
Out of all the La Trappe beers so far, my least favorite. Although it has a dark and complex taste, it simple doesnt do it for me.
UPDATED: OCT 21, 2016 A red brown, Belgian, unfiltered "double" trappist ale with high light brown head. Aroma is complex yeasty, spicy, caramel, coffee, roasted. Taste is bitter sweet.
UPDATED: OCT 28, 2015 Ganske god Dubbel, ikke helt oppe at ringe. Savner lidt fylde. Meget mørk, flot skum.

Thinner palate than Westmalle and not as complex aromas or flavors. Aromas of caramel, toast, spicy phenols and belgian banana esters. Flavors of spicy belgian yeast, ripe banana, raisin. Carbonation not as high as other belgians. Finish is not completely dry, leaving a bit of sugary coating.

Aromat: Intensywny owocowy, śliwkowy, wiśnie, słodki, karmel 
Wygląd: Brązowy, klarowny, skąpa szara piana
Smak: Umiarkowana słodycz z niezbyt wysoką alkoholową goryczką Nuty tostowe. Po ogrzaniu wychodzą nuty karmelowe
Odczucie: Alkoholowe rozgrzanie, wysokie nagazowanie, szczypie w język, smukłe,wytrawne

Pours clear reddish brown with small white off-white head. Aroma is malty, nuts, sugar, caramel, strawberry, date. Grassy hops, resin, citrus. Dough, basement. Notes of vanilla, banana. Medium sweet, medium bitter, average long finish with notes of wood. Body is medium to full, palate is oily, carbonation is lively.

On tap at The Mayor of Old Town. Clear light brown appearance with a white ring of foam. Aroma of Belgian yeast, banana, chocolate, clove and dark malts. Similar flavor, medium sweetness with a bit of a syrupy feel. Overall, its okay.

Deep dark brown beer, with light head. Touches of caramel and dried fruit.
An "average double ".I miss body in this beer.

-really sweet malt,candi sugar, big banana up front
-bubble gum,cherry,molasses present
-bland finish
-overcarbonated (beer exploded upon opening even though stored correctly)

good, but the Rochefort 6 and Westmalle have a much more pleasant finish and are better overall
330ml bottle at home. Dark brown Belgian dubbel with a sweet, dark fruity aftertaste.
brown, cloudy, tan foam, caramel, roasty, toast, medium body, oily feel, average carbonation, heavy cloying sweetness, medium bitterness,

UPDATED: AUG 22, 2015 Beertasting. Bottle, 75 cl. Dark brown body with a beige head. Sweet aroma with dried fruits. Full taste with light bitterness. Light body with average carbonation. Great dubbel.
330cc bottle. Pours dark amber with creamy white off head. Lots of caramel, but floral and peppery hoppiness in the back. Sweet toffee with a slightly dryer finish. Reminds me of their Bock bier.
Bottle in the Magnolia Beer Cafe in Keswick. Deep chestnut with an off white head. Aroma of dried fruit and port. The taste is spicy with toffee, raisin and port. Very tasty. High carbonation.
Bitta molto cremosa, colore ambrato scuro. È corposa il sapore è dolce amato, gradazione alcolica media

Brown color, cloudy liquid and medium head.
Sweet (caramel) and alcoholic aroma.
On the palate it is acidic, bitter and very sweet.
Very good dubbel!!!
Dark brown/amber color, with big thick brownish head. Taste is sweet and full. Aroma is fruity with caramel notes. Really good beer with medium-full flavor.
Bordeau liquid, average head. Aroma is sweet and fruity. Medium body, little carbonation. Taste is sweet.

Foam is close, continuous and absolutely beautiful. At the same time filled my nose with an expectant malty aroma. When I lift the glass to assess the flavor is enhanced malt aroma and mixed with a light hop and lots of fruit. Foam still hangs thick on the inside of the glass and the taste is first sweetish. So sweet that you should first think it is a beer fr dessert, but in the subsequent second opens the beer itself and fills the mouth with the sweet caramel malt, the bitter but still light hops and the refreshing and tasty fruit flavors which include plums. I also sense a faint taste nuance of nuts. On the whole, the taste is very complex and full-bodied, and although I have always loved Westmalle Dubbel very high and loyal so I think this dubbel is quite on the same level. The finish is long and pleasantly bitter and slightly marked by a little acidity. Can certainly be recommend very highly.

Bottled, 33 cl. Appearance: brown red, beautiful thick head. No visible but audible fizz. Muted aroma: caramel, malt, raisins.Taste is sweet. Palate is felt on the tongue. Aftertaste - light bitter on the sides of the tongue.

How:  Bottle.  Apperance:  Red brown color with a large fizzy good lacing white head.  Aroma:  moderate malty, caramel, brown sugar.  Taste:  moderate to heavy sweet and light bitter with a average duration.  Palate:  Body is medium, texture is oily, carbonation is average.
On keg at house of trembling madness York a clear brown beer with fruity malt aroma flavour is yeast brown sugar sweet fruity muscovado sugar

Aroma licorice, raisin, plum
Appearance red, brown, clear, white foam, 
Taste medium sweetness, 
Palate medium body, 
Overall a really nice dubbel that to me smells like Swedish fish and tastes like dark fruits. I would suggest this beer to a friend
Pours lovely chestnut brown with small silky head quite sweet bready alcohol taste with over ripe fruit short spicy sweet finish nice dubbel missing that knockout finish somewhere

UPDATED: DEC 20, 2015 Cloudy chestnut pour. Beige thick foam good retention. Carbonated. Caramel, liquorice, figs , plum, faint banana and mouldy in the nose. Caramel, Brown sugar, dark fruit, cherries, plume  and vanilla taste. A very Nice glass love it
Cor marrom acobreado. Espuma boa, cremosa e de média persistência. Aroma intenso de frutas, cereais e caramelo. No paladar notas de frutas escuras e vermelhas, levemente adocicada. Amazing!!!

Uitgeschonken in La Trappe bokaal, bruin bier, een mahoniekleur met rode gloed, mediumhoge beige schuimkraag die zich na enkele minuten terugtrekt tot een fijne schuimring. Volle iets zoete aroma's van karamel, rozijnen, en fruit esters. Meteen de kenmerkende zoetige bananensmaak die in meerdere La Trappe bieren terug te vinden is. Verdere tonen van koekjes, chocolade, lichte koffie, in de verte iets van aarde en leer. De afdronk is lang mooi hopbitter met een zachte carbonatie. De dubbel van La Trappe haalt bijna het niveau van de Westmalle dubbel. Verfijnd medium complex en met een een mooie lange afdronk. Het is interessant om dit bier enkele jaren te bewaren, het krijgt dan een meer wijnachtig aroma en smaakpallet. Zoals ik ooit heb geproefd bij een 75 cl. fles. Net als bij Westmalle dubbel geen grenadine toevoegen! Het bier is zoet genoeg van zichzelf en het bederft de smaakcomplexiteit en de afdronk van dit mooie Trappisten bier.

Botella. Color ámbar oscuro casi opaco. Bien de espuma, de color ligeramente beige.
Aroma delicioso. Afrutado con un sorprendente predominio de la pera. También algo de uvas pasas.
En boca cambia. Predomina el caramelo. Dulce para un final seco, pelín amargo y moderadamente alcohólico, sobre todo en el postgusto.
Bastante rica, aunque quizá con un punto alcohólico demasiado notable para su graduación.
Lekkere dubbel. Smaakt een klein beetje naar drop en caramel. Fijne zoete afdronk.
Clear dark amber/copper, offwhite froth. Aroma is fruity and malty with hints of yeast. Sweetish, malty flavour with some caramel, fruit and bitterness coming through.

Colore rosso intenso, scuro, molto bello, con schiuma cremosa.
Odore fruttato e caramellato.
Sapore molto fruttato, frutta matura, leggero asprigno, buon odore e sapore di malto e caramello. Toni dolci in primo piano ma non stucchevoli. Molto buona.

Deep ruby body, big browish head. Sweet aroma, caramel, candy sugar, dried fruits, spicy notes. Complex malt flavours. Candy sugar and dried fruits. Liquorice notes. Medium warm spicy finish. Medium-full body, low carbo. Tasty brew if you have sweet tooth.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Donkerbruin bier met schuim. Smaak is hoppig bitter en zoet, lichte rook, caramel, ietwat anijs. Erg goede dubbel, smaak blijft lang hangen.

Pours a dark hazy body with a thin head. Sweet aroma of sugary candies. Very nice taste with complex malty tones.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Bottle at Monastarium Brussels . Dark body . Sweet dried fruit aroma. Taste of bubblegum and banana and dried fruit. Fantastic dubbel.
330ml bottle. Brown color with beige head. Caramel malty aroma, light fruity and light yeasty. Sweet and light bitter taste. Medium oily body with soft carbonation.
A tasty dubbel. Aromas of dark fruit, bubblegum. Great sweet and malty flavours too. Excellent
Pretty standard double. Still very drinkable. Nice subtle sweet tones, fresh and light.
head diminishes, caramel, drinks like cola , a pretty standard decent double without much to set it apart from others.

Bottle from McHughs. Pours clearish deep wine red. Thin tan bubble head. Raisins, dark fruit, bread, little bit of clove on nose. Flavour is fruity bread, Raisins. Medium bodied with creamy mouthfeel. Nice.
Piwo miedziane, nieprzejrzyste. Piana niska, szybko znika. Estry, bananowość, wiśnie i aceton. W smaku owocowa słodowość. Pełne, wysokowysycone.
Super dejlig øl, der er god til pizza, kylling og lette retter. Bør nydes kold. Ikke speciel kraftig, og derfor drikkes af de fleste. God smag.

Bottle. Dark brown body with tan head. Aroma is roasted caramel with yeast and hintsdark chocolate. Taste is very thin with malts and hints of cafe latte. Aftertaste is also thin with caramel malts and nearly no bitterness.
Ótimo aroma. Sabor frutado e percepção do álcool na medida certa. Aparência perfeita, cor âmbar e espuma consistente.
Dark brown coffeish appearance with a handsome, creamy head. Very dry notes of roasted malt and - again - coffee. Pronounced bitterness and a touch of acid.

Coloração acobreada,líquido turvo,espuma bege cremosa com boa formação e média duração,boa carbonatação formando bolhas pequenas;no aroma malte tostado,caramelo e notas frutadas;sabor adocicado sem ser enjoativo acompanha o aroma,amargor quase inexistente,álcool notado mas sem comprometer,corpo médio,boa drinkability para o estilo,final e retrogosto com bom dulçor e uma certo picante. Boa Trapista,saborosa e facil de beber,gostei.
Schiuma eterna, odore e gusto molto pieni e amara al punto giusto, nulla da invidiare alle colleghe belghe

Mahogany brown with off-white head that disappeared within a minute on this pour. Strong pear drops aroma, some spice, some crystalline sweetness. Taste adds a malt liquorice component, and emphasizes phenols. Light carbonation.
Bottle 330 ml. Strong belgian ale, but quite light in taste at the same time. Fruits in taste and aroma, not much bitterness, sweet and creamy.

Shared 11.2 oz. bottle poured to snifters, displaying a deep burgundy/mahogany color, with a frothy layer of off white head foam, and dots & dashes of cling lacing. The nose was dark/dried fruit, a touch of caramel sweetness, light phenols, with a hint of vanilla. Medium bodied, with decent carbonation, the taste was similar notes as the aroma, more of a lightly ripened character to the esters, malty, with a pleasant creaminess to the mouthfeel, and noticeable, but fairly hidden alcohol. One of a number of quality benchmarks for the style.

33cl bottle at bar Castel, Ghent. Classic trappist dubbel, dark brown coloured brew with little foam. Sugar, caramel, chocolate flavoured with yeast and malt notes. The taste is full bodied with clear features of dark fruits, chocolate, wood, licorice, malts, maybe some "iron" and spirit. Bitter, candy sweet, caramel.
Dark brown color, small beige head. Aroma of caramel, malt, dried fruits, spices. Sweet and lightly bitter taste, spicy aftertaste. Medium body and fizzy carbonation. Decent dubbel.
Marron oscura tirando a rojiza. Aroma afrutado, caramelo y bizcocho. En boca mas frutal que dulce, frambuesa y uvas. Cuerpo y carbonatacion medios. Final medianamente amargo.
Bottle. Big tanned head. Clear deep ruby. Herbs and berries on aroma. Comlex and fresh. Strong and drinkable. Enjoyable.-- rated with beerbasher/winphone

Color mogano, limpida, schiuma ocra poco persistente.
Aroma di banana matura, zucchero caramellato, frutta secca, leggere note di frutti rossi, chiodi di garofano e lievito.
Al palato banana matura, chiodi di garofano e zucchero caramellato, discreta nota alcolica sul finale.
Corpo medio, molto carbonata.
Bottle. Great color. Nice appearence and taste like the belgian trappist beer. Great one
Espuma blanca tirando a marrón, color marrón oscuro, aroma afrutado en nariz, sabor dulce en principio que se torna en un retrogusta más amargo y muy sabroso.

Bottle from Whole Foods High St Kensington. Clear dark brown, thin off white head. Nose is dark stone fruits, prune, raisin, caramel, tart tatin, pear, candied pear, Taste is caramel, pear, prune, raisin, some dry little astringent fruity hop, pear wine. It tastes a little younger than something like Westmalle. Bit dryer, harder flavours but it still good.
Dark amber colour with a nice head. Aroma is malt, caramel, yeast. Taste is sweet, fruity, yeast, with a light bitterness. Medium body, dry finish. To hight carbonation for me.

WYGLĄD: Barwa ciemno miedziana, zamglone. Piana niska, drobna, znika do zera.
AROMAT: Średnio intensywny. Estrowe: banan, wiśnie w likierze. 
SMAK: Najkrócej jak można - słodowe z owocowymi akcentami.
OGÓLNIE: Piwo przyjemne w odbiorze. Bardzo miło się je degustuje. Stonowane, ale też nie mdłe/nudne. Dobrze zbalansowane.
Aroma sweet and a bit peppery color dark Ruby foam slowly disappearing flavor hints of caramel faint liqourish alcohol and some bitterness its a decent dubbel
Bottle from Brugsen. Pours dark amber/brown with a beige head. Taste is malts, toffee, dried fruits, caramel, hint of spices. Medium to full body. Soft carbonation. Sweet caramelized finish.

Robe brune, légèrement ambrée. Mousse peu.
Saveurs de malt, fruits rouges et noirs. Légèrement boisée. Un peu aigre. Texture épaisse. Longue en bouche.
Une bonne double.

UPDATED: OCT 4, 2015 Aroma:
Intense sour, malt, caramel, coffee, yeast.

Appearance:
Dark brown with a off-white head.

Taste/Palate:
Very malty, sour, flowers.

Overall:
The aroma is way too sour, the appearance is not too shabby and the taste is decent.

Draught at Coopers Chelsea. Rubyish brown with little head. Aroma is big bright ripe red fruit, soil, some spice, yeast. Flavor isnt as rich but holds down with caramel sweetness, some fruit, and a healthy earthy bitterness feel is very dense with soft carbonation and a clean finish. Very classic and very nice
Bottiglia 500ml. Fermentata in bottiglia, il gusto amaro è dato dai malti caramellati, il sentore è fruttato alla banana e il colore ai frutti rossi è dato dal lievito.

Aroma: caramel, bread malts, sweet fruits, some grain malts, light yeast. Appearance: hazy amber, medium, creamy, beige head. Taste: light sweet. Palate: sweets continue, caramel, toffee, light bitters coming up, light yeast again, light and dry finish. Overall: very nice Dubbel, well-balanced. Pint at Cerveceria La Mayor, Madrid.

33cl bottle at home from Mitra, Maarssen. Body is clear deep amber brown, head is medium, beige, average lasting, good lacing. Nose is roasty, fruity, flavor is dried fruits, chocolate, medium roasted malt, mild spicy, hint of champagne. Medium to heavy sweet, medium bitter, hint of fruity sour. Finish is medium lasting roasty bittersweet. Medium to full body, slightly sticky texture, lively carbonation. Great light dessert beer.

Lovely inviting clear deep brownish color with a solid tan head. Some lacing in a typical wide trappist glass. Nice complex aroma. Dried fruits, toffee and some spices. Medium to full body. Mild round pleasant sweetness, and a quite moderate carbonation. Dried fruits, dark malt, toffee and some spices in the flavor. Complex and yet quite easy to drink. Lovely beer.[Bottle at You Never walk alone in Kolding, Denmark]
bottle from beer hawk strong malt aroma sweet on the aroma and the taste not for me this one but thats because its not my type of beer sadly as im sure people who like these types will love it

Dark reddish brown colour with almost no light brown head. Aroma of dark fruits, barley malts, some spices. Taste is similar, sweet, alcohol note is very well hidden. Low carbonation. Sweet, fruity finish.
Bottle, 330 ml from Vrutak, Zagreb. Pours cloudy brown with beige head. Sweetish, Caramel malty, fruit, bready, spicy notes.

Butelka pita w Holandii. Kolor bursztynowy mocny, nagazowane super, tzn. tak jak trzeba.Aromat karmelu i suszonych owoców. Smak złożony owocowy z przewagą toffi. Wspaniale ułożone piwo. To napisałem ja ,wielbiciel ,,belgów" toc to ,,belg"
75 cl. champagne-flaske. 7,0 % Hollands trappist-øl. Mørkt med lysebrunt skum. Smager ganske udmærket. Knap så stærk som nogle af de belgiske fætre.
Bottle with expiry date 10.2016. Brown colour, clear, small head. Aroma is not very intensive, with caramel, cherry, prune. Alcohol does not disturb. Lively carbonation. A bit disappointing.
On draft at Blackstone. This is a fairly yeasty and dry dubbel. I tasted malt, light fruity notes, and prune. There is some complexity. Good.

Dark cloudy brown, with a thick beige head that lingers long time.
Intense aromas of chocolate, vine leaf, red berries, bread, coffee and honey.
Medium sweet, powerful and full-bodied. Creamy, with hints of salty and savoury flavors as it delves down the mouth. Long finish with memories of coffee and milk. Great.

Pours a hazy brown colour, with a lasting off-white head. Pronounced aroma of yeast, banana and biscuits. Balanced malty taste, that reminds me of cake and grapes. Dryish aftertaste remains. Interesting and complex.

Po przelaniu do szkła (kielich do belgijskiego piwa) połowy zawartości butelki zobaczyłem pod światło piękny przejrzysty rubin. Piana beżowa z drobnych i średnich pęcherzy szybko opadła, nie pozostawiając śladu na szkle. Po dolaniu reszty ukazał się nieciekawy widok w postaci grubych farfocli (drożdżowych) unoszących się w płynie. 
Aromat delikatny, ciemnych słodów i karmelu oraz alkoholu. W smaku jest bardziej wytrawnie z dodatkiem ciemnych owoców typu wiśnia i śliwka. Z czasem daje o sobie znać wysokie wysycenie, zaś alkohol objawia się ciepłem w żołądku.
Pity pod koniec stycznia tripel zrobił na mnie lepsze wrażenie.
Brown pour, tan head. Nose is yeast, malt, hint banana. Bittersweet. Middle is cork, dried figs, apple, little more banana. Finish is bittersweet.
01-16-2015 - I know, it is a Trappist, but that doesnt mean I have to like it.
0.33 flaske. Mørk med gyllent skum som forsvant raskt. Aroma gjær malt karamell. Smak karamel honning. Sylig og Søt på en gang. Medium co2
